name: my_chatapp
description: A full-stack chatting web application built using **React.js** for the frontend, **Express.js** for the backend, and **MongoDB** for the database. Users can register, log in, and send messages. This project is a great starting point for learning full-stack development and integrating frontend with backend and database.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
